JSC370: Data Science II

Winter 2026 · University of Toronto

Where and When

  • Instructor: Meredith Franklin
    • Email: meredith.franklin@utoronto.ca, please put “JSC370” in the subject line.
  • Teaching Assistants: Johnny Meng and Mandy Yao
  • Time: Mondays (Lecture) and Wednesdays (Lab), 1-3pm
  • Location: MS 3278 (Mondays), (Wednesdays)
  • Office hours: TBD
  • Course Forum: Piazza

Weekly Course Schedule

Week Dates Topics / Weekly Activities Due (end of day):
Labs Wed, HW Sun
Week 1 January 5 (lecture)
January 7 (lab)		 Introduction to Data Science tools: Python, Quarto, VS Code Lab 1
Week 2 January 12 (lecture)
January 14 (lab)		 Version Control & Reproducible Research, Git/GitHub Lab 2
Week 3 January 19 (lecture)
January 21 (lab)		 Exploratory Data Analysis Lab 3
Week 4 January 26 (lecture)
January 28 (lab)		 Data visualization HW1, Lab 4
Week 5 February 2 (lecture)
February 4 (lab)		 Data cleaning and wrangling; ML 1 Lab 5
Week 6 February 9 (lecture)
February 11 (lab)		 Regular expressions; data scraping; using APIs HW2, Lab 6
Week 7 February 16 Reading Week
Week 8 February 23 (lecture)
February 25 (lab)		 Text mining, LLMs Lab 8
Week 9 March 2 (lecture)
March 4 (lab)		 High performance computing; cloud computing HW3, Lab 9
Week 10 March 9 (lecture)
March 11 (lab)		 ML 2 (trees, random forests, boosting) Midterm, Lab 10
Week 11 March 16 (lecture)
March 18 (lab)		 Interactive visualization & effective data communication Lab 11
Week 12 March 23 (lecture)
March 25 (lab)		 Building Website and Interactive Apps HW4, Lab 12
Week 13 March 30 (lecture)
April 1 (lab)		 Wrap-Up HW5
Week 15 April 26 Final Project

Grading Breakdown

Task % of Grade
Labs (including attendance and guest speaker reflections) 15
Homework (5) 25
Midterm report 25
Final project 35

Readings (Not Required)

  • Python for Data Analysis (3e), 2023. Wes McKinney.
  • Python Data Science Handbook, Jake VanderPlas.
  • The Turing Way: Reproducible, ethical, and collaborative data science.
  • Pro Git (online book), Scott Chacon and Ben Straub.
  • An Introduction to Statistical Learning, 2023 James, Witten, Hastie, Tibshirani, Taylor

Data

Many of these websites provide APIs and/or bulk downloads.

Canadian Data

  • Government of Canada Open Data (Open Government Portal): https://open.canada.ca/en
  • Statistics Canada (Census + surveys): https://www12.statcan.gc.ca/census-recensement/index-eng.cfm
  • Statistics Canada Web Data Service (API): https://www.statcan.gc.ca/en/microdata/api
  • Canada GIS Data: https://canadiangis.com/
  • University of Toronto Library (Geospatial data guides): https://guides.library.utoronto.ca/c.php?g=250719&p=4976498
  • City of Toronto Open Data: https://open.toronto.ca/
  • Toronto Police Service Open Data: https://data.torontopolice.on.ca/pages/open-data
  • Ontario Data Catalogue: https://data.ontario.ca/
  • Public Health Ontario Open Data: https://www.publichealthontario.ca/en/data-and-analysis/using-data/open-data
  • British Columbia Data Catalogue: https://catalogue.data.gov.bc.ca/

Environmental and Climate Data

  • US EPA Air Quality Data: https://www.epa.gov/outdoor-air-quality-data
  • US EPA AQS Data API (Air Quality System): https://aqs.epa.gov/aqsweb/documents/ramltohtml.html
  • NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI): https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/
  • NOAA NCEI Access Data Service (API): https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/support/access-data-service-api-user-documentation
  • North American Regional Climate Change Assessment Program (NARCCAP): https://narccap.ucar.edu/
  • Natural Resources Canada (Geospatial data/tools): https://natural-resources.canada.ca/science-data/data-analysis/geospatial-data-tools-services/geospatial-data-tools-services
  • Coastal wave / buoy data (CDIP, UCSD): https://cdip.ucsd.edu/m/deployment/station_view/
  • Great Lakes Bathymetry (NOAA): https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/products/great-lakes-bathymetry
  • US Energy Information Administration (EIA): https://www.eia.gov/

International and Global Data

  • UN Geospatial Hub: https://geoservices.un.org/webapps/geohub/
  • UNdata API manual: https://data.un.org/Host.aspx?Content=API
  • World Bank Open Data: https://data.worldbank.org/
  • World Bank Developer / API info: https://datahelpdesk.worldbank.org/knowledgebase/topics/125589-developer-information
  • FAO FAOSTAT (global food/agriculture stats): https://www.fao.org/faostat/en/#data
  • FAOSTAT API entry point: https://faostatservices.fao.org/api/v1
  • NASA Earthdata (data catalog): https://www.earthdata.nasa.gov/data/catalog

US Data

  • Data.gov (catalog): https://catalog.data.gov/
  • Data.gov Geospatial datasets: https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/?metadata_type=geospatial
  • US Census (NHGIS): https://www.nhgis.org/
  • NYU Spatial Data Repository: https://geo.nyu.edu/
  • Google Earth Engine datasets: https://developers.google.com/earth-engine/datasets/
  • Google Dataset Search: https://datasetsearch.research.google.com/
  • FiveThirtyEight data (GitHub): https://github.com/fivethirtyeight/data
  • Los Angeles Open Data: https://data.lacity.org/

Health and Biological Data

  • SEER (NIH/NCI cancer surveillance): https://seer.cancer.gov/
  • World Health Organization (GHO OData API): https://www.who.int/data/gho/info/gho-odata-api
  • CDC Open Data: https://data.cdc.gov/
  • California Health & Human Services Open Data: https://data.chhs.ca.gov/
  • Canada COVID tracking (community project): https://covid19tracker.ca/
  • UniProt (proteins): https://www.uniprot.org/
  • Gene Ontology: http://geneontology.org/

News, Media, and Text Data

  • New York Times APIs (specs repo): https://github.com/NYTimes/public_api_specs
  • The Guardian Open Platform: https://open-platform.theguardian.com/
  • GDELT Project (global news/events): https://www.gdeltproject.org/
  • Common Crawl (web archive): https://commoncrawl.org/get-started
  • Wikipedia / Wikimedia APIs (MediaWiki REST API): https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/API:REST_API/en

Social Networks and Platforms

  • X (Twitter) Developer Platform: https://developer.twitter.com/
  • GitHub REST API: https://docs.github.com/en/rest
  • Instagram Platform (Graph API docs live under Meta for Developers): https://developers.facebook.com/docs/instagram-api/
  • LinkedIn API documentation (Microsoft Learn): https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/linkedin/
  • Spotify Web API: https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api
  • Zillow Group Data & APIs: https://www.zillowgroup.com/developers/

Academic Publications and Research Data

  • Figshare: https://figshare.com/
  • Zenodo: https://zenodo.org/
  • Harvard Dataverse: https://dataverse.harvard.edu/
  • Elsevier Developer APIs: https://dev.elsevier.com/
  • OpenAlex (scholarly metadata + API): https://docs.openalex.org/
